lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everybody! Welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and roll dice and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My name is Matthew Mercer. I am the Dungeon Master of the show. Before we get started, let's go ahead and run through our announcements for the evening. First, I wanted to let you guys know that tonight-- tomorrow, I'm sorry. Tomorrow is the last day to preorder your Dagger Dagger Dagger shirt. Is it also the last day to do the Strongjaw Ale?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strongjaw Ale and Dagger Dagger Dagger shirts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also ale.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I need them!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do need them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You do. Actually, Ashley, I think I got shirts for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we've got some shirts held for you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Extra large!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But if you're not Ashley, you'd better get yourself a shirt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. So you have until tomorrow to get those, so go to the Geek and Sundry store to preorder if you're interested. Yay! Next up, a reminder, me and Marisha are flying out bright and early tomorrow morning to Pittsburgh for Tekko! We're going to be doing awesome panels on voiceover and gaming and all points nerdy on the Internet in between, as well as signings and autographs and all that fun stuff. So if you're in the area and you want to find a place that's warm, we'll be there in the convention, so hopefully we'll see you guys over the weekend.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I went to college there, so I'm going to be finding my old homies and getting drunk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have a college sweater that just says "college"? You could really use one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I went to the performing arts school, and we did make football t-shirts, because we thought it was funny, as our performing arts shirts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That sounds like a performing arts joke.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fascinating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool story, bro.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to be taking over Ivan's No Survivors slot that evening to run a Pathfinder one-shot that I'll be running. However, Ivan will actually be playing as a player in that one.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Destroyed. Ivan will be playing. We also will have guesting players of Taliesin and Marisha in that game as well, and we have two special guests that evening who will be playing with us: the illustrious Ashly Burch will be joining us for the evening, and the wonderfully talented Phil Lamarr as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what? I didn't know that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! So it's going to be a fun night playing Pathfinder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When is that, again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is April 18th, Monday at 7 PM, Pacific Time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aren't taxes due that day?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you're done with your taxes, this is a great way to celebrate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A great way to celebrate. I'll be filing an extension, like everybody else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, those of you out there who are members of the Nerd Block, or are looking to be, this upcoming, now live, Nerd Block that is going out has a little surprise in there, a little artistic surprise for fans of Critical Role.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh? What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They'll have to see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, a tiny poop. I'm in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A teeny-tiny poop, just from Sam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But yeah, those of you out there who want to check it out, we have a fun little insert there in the box. You get to see if you grab one, so check it out and see if it's to your liking. Liam, did you want to talk about--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah, hey! You know my love for Wyrmwood Gaming and their boxes. We have these beautiful ones. Lift up a Wyrmwood box.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Oh my goodness.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They make great, beautiful boxes. They have all kinds of woods to hold your dice in, and if you use the code "critrole," you will get free shipping. But also, today, I would like to let you all know that Wyrmwood Gaming has a kickstarter for their Sentinel box. I'm sure I'm forgetting the actual name, but it's a beautiful box. It's good for D&D, it's good for Magic: The Gathering, and it holds cards, it holds dice, there's a Bluetooth in it so that if you lose it, you can find it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Satellites can see it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wish we had the box in front of us, but go look it up, it's got this box on the top, and then it separates on the bottom and you can put your dice in the bottom.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's called the Sentinel deck box. There's also a version of it called the Vox Machina, which is a premium item, and it's gorgeous.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Premium, premium, premium.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Premium. But tossing this out, too, if you guys want any of the other Sentinel deck boxes and you want to get the logo etched onto it, that's also an option. I don't know if it's on the site or not, but it will be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's an off-the-menu item.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Check it out!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 'Twill be there. Gorgeous box.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That sounds like something Gilmore would sell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Oh, he would. Don't worry. He would be happy to sell that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And because of the Bluetooth feature, the NSA will track your every roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're now on the Homeland Security list.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Do we have anything else you guys wanted to announce before we get started?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That fucking Rogue One trailer! Holy shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I haven't seen it yet!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. No words. No words. No words!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it like Batman vs. Superman good?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't set expectations you can't match.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see it, Ashley?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes! Gimme!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. All the things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sure it's cool. I haven't seen it yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, on the break! On the break, on the break.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we'll watch it on the break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I haven't had a chance, I've been busy working on this shit for you guys!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, you don't just make this stuff up as you go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (mock weeping) No, I have to prepare.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's imaginary, how could it be? You just flow with it. Right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I thought this was scripted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've been in rehearsal all day for this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, Wyrmwood crashed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wyrmwood crashed? Sorry, Wyrmwood. Or you're welcome, Wyrmwood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm Instagramming my Wyrmwood box right now, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well done. Well done, legion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Colbert Nation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I should say, the etching is a new development, so if that's not happening today, it'll be there tomorrow-ish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, so don't yell at them. Don't be like, "Bullshit!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's either going to be there tomorrow or very soon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because we literally got an email about it as we were starting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now we go to our deaths.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, we bring it back. I will ask if we could turn that speaker down a little bit. A little bit more. That's good. Great. All right, guys. Let's plug in to the world of Exandria, as we begin tonight's episode of Critical Role. So, last we left off, the adventuring party of Vox Machina, traversing the lands in search of lost artifacts of wars of old, referred to as the Vestiges of Divergence, in hopes of eventually tearing down and defeating a conclave of chromatic dragons called the Chroma Conclave that have destroyed society all across the continent of Tal'Dorei and beyond, you returned to the outskirts of a city named Westruun that was very important in your early adventures, to find it, from a distance, partially destroyed by the dragon attack but a couple weeks before, and since taken over by what seems to be the remnants, now swelling in power and size, of Grog's old herd of wandering barbarians and various savages. Having taken the city by force and ruling it with an iron hand, it was also deemed not the right time to face this foe, and as such the party continued venturing southward in the direction of the Frostweald, where somewhere at the base of the Stormpeak Mountains, the mate of Osysa, the gynosphinx you had met in Vasselheim-- her mate resides somewhere in this vicinity. That's all the information you have to go on as you head down towards the frozen forest. So. That's where we begin. As you guys continue pushing south from Westruun, seeing the distant pillars of dark smoke that slowly drift into the atmosphere disappear as the town itself vanishes over the horizon, you continue to push southward through the open grass fields. You continue traveling for the better part of a day, eventually coming up along the side of the Silvercut Channel, which is the river that comes down and cuts through near Kraghammer to the west of Westruun. It goes past Kymal and then eventually heads down in this direction, towards the Foramere Basin. You guys, travelling fairly quickly, as you're in your mist forms, which is making up a lot of the normal travel time you would have to worry about here, by the time the sun finally begins to set across the mountains-- pay attention, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's another beholder!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've got plenty of things I could throw in here if you guys aren't paying attention!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not funny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's really funny for me. As you guys continue pushing southward, as the sun slowly begins to set in the distance, you glance over towards the Foramere Basin. You can see, just over to the right, the city of Kymal, which has lights glimmering in the far distance. But what you see by the basin itself is this large lake that is centered in this region just north of the Frostweald. You can see where the two main rivers diverge before heading southward towards the ocean. There's a smattering of various tents that are clustered right towards the side of the riverbank and the edge of the lake itself. As you continue coasting overhead in your mist forms, you see small trails of smoke from smoldering campfires, clusters of people and families wandering the shore in this small group. You continue going forward?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we should check it out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to, you can keep going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a tent city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're refugees, probably.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hundreds, thousands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's probably a few dozen, close to maybe 50, 60.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do the tents look like? Do they look like military encampment tents, or refugee tents?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't really tell from this distance, especially as the light is beginning to slowly diminish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we float closer?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We float down, we float down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, are we still mists?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my God.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That whole description, and yes, we're still mists.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you coast down closer, you get a better look, and yeah, there are about 50, 60 or so people on the outside. You don't have an idea of how many are inside the tents. Even more, most likely. But these tents are fairly ramshackle, barely standing, the people look destitute. They look like they're holding onto survival here on the outside of the city. You see a few boats that are going in and out on the shore, probably fishermen. There are a few bonfires that are now starting to kick up as the night's cold begins to swell in. It looks like this is a fairly "thriving," a fairly functional refugee camp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, those that give a fuck, speak up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't, we're in mist form.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then like (hissing) in a direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can --

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (buzzing fart sound)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can send them back to Whitestone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe, if we could talk, which we can't right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I float down. Into the trees, outside of the camp.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a few rock formations and small hills, you might be able to get out of sight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Around there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you coast around there and you go back into your physical form. The rest of you follow?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tall grass? Low grass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's probably thigh-length.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Following.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For you, close to the knee.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Near the rocks, so that we're in camouflage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys set down maybe 300 feet from the outside of the nearest part of the camp, reconstitute into your physical forms. At this point, the sun has now disappeared over the horizon and the blues have now gone to orange, to purple, and you can see in the distance the darkness of night is starting to crest over the sky. What do you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are we stopped for? Are we here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it looks like a refugee camp, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They may have information.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: People that escaped from Westruun, potentially.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I mean, it's a large group of people, I'm assuming they came from a city of some sort.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we go over there and it gets a little hairy, you've still got old magic door, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Old magic doll?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hugh Hefner house!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah, magic door. Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Magic doll if you have it, too, for later, but yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I have a little Pike figurine that I keep with me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, no, it's a keepsake!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm sure it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why is everything I say creepy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know, why is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we should pop them back to Whitestone. I feel like it might be good, if we find out if they're hurting. That's where we're putting our survivors.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They look like they're hurting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I couldn't help with that today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. We could rest overnight, and you could pop them in in the morning?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's late. Sun's gone down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Super late. Yeah, and if they're from Westruun--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you out of all your-- oh, mist form.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mist form got us here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's worth talking to them at the very least.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Pike and I are from Westruun. If they're of that village, or that city, I'd like to make sure they're all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe they're friends.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we'd find Pike's grandfather.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grandfather Wilhelm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy, would Whitestone be able to sustain this many more people?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think at some point we're going to have to have that conversation, but for now I think we'll probably be all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're good for it. You're rich.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here's an idea. Scanlan, you said that a lot of people can go into your house, yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can fit many people into my hole.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you-- (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wonder why everything he says is creepy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you invite the folk in, and then they live in your hole for a little while, and then when we get to Whitestone, you open your hole and out they come?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, not quite.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's some cartel shit right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. We become "Vox Machina: Coyotes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan is the mule.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, the house is mainly for us and a few guests, for one night at a time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't, like, leave them there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Didn't you say 100 people, the other day?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 100 servants are in there. I don't quite-- I haven't jammed people in there. I don't know how many it can totally hold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You mean, you've never thrown a party?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll an intelligence check

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Smile upon us, dice gods!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, it is stationary in its entrance and exit and then once the spell comes to completion after a 24-hour period, it expels anyone and anything that was brought into it, on the spot where it was originally cast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like gently, or like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a flush.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like (sweetly) "Please leave." or like (angry) "Get the fuck out!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that a yes or a no?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not a transporting-type spell. It is a temporary shelter, at best.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just don't want to bring them in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Listen, I'll consider taking the females in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is very noble of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So noble, Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will join him in this charity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, all right, why don't we just walk around and talk to these people? Maybe they're not even interested in being transported. Let's just find some citizens around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we make sure they're actually innocent, nice people?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should probably do that as well, not like a band of thieves. Bandits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealth ahead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That could be fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I sneak ahead and just listen to them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, sneaking up on them will definitely put them on our side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, like 100 yards out. I just want to hear what they're saying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, all right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She can read lips so she doesn't even get that close.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's pretty dark, though. But I do have good darkvision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you're going alone?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, twins.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Twins going together?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Why don't you both roll a stealth check?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I guess I'm going then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm keeping an eye also, to see if anything-- From a great distance, I'm just keeping an eye out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're in the woods, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You are in the plains.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There are no woods, tall grasses

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just kidding, we're in the grasslands.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grass, grass. 32.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll roll this big bastard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: White manna, not green manna.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm hiding in a tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no-- (annoyed hmm)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's no-- (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "There's no (grumbles)"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The grass to me is like a tree

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Almost like they've accepted the circumstances and are just surviving it for the time being. There are a few individuals that are armed, though the armor itself seems patchwork, or you know, not the best or most trained of individuals currently guarding this group of survivors. But there are patrols going around, people keeping a close look, there are torches being lit now as people begin walking--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see anyone that we recognize from Westruun?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not from this distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your darkvision you can make out the outline of the very, very nearest individuals, the guards in particular. But at this distance, nobody catches your eye that you'd be able to make out much detail on, that you would recognize.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we just sit for five or ten minutes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, the guards are coming through with torches, I don't want them to find us and think we're spies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But we are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but I don't want them to think that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But we are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I think you can stay 'cause you're more hidden than I am. I'm going to go back to the group.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like they're going to see me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckling) You don't know that. As far as you know, you're so hidden.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "I'm so hidden." Shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, all right, all right. Just a second.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just going to stay here for a couple of minutes longer. Wait, you said they were coming our direction or they're just-- ?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they're just wandering. Just patrolling

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh all right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're paranoid!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, fine fine fine fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let me listen for a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I'll have you both roll perception checks, if you could.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a few folks that catch your attention a little bit. There's one that was Elowen Brist, who was the mother of the first child that went missing in Westruun. You see her, with her daughter who's a little bit older now that you guys helped save her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All these throwbacks are blowing my mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You scan through the crowd, keeping an eye out for the guard as well. No one really catches your attention. You see one older gentleman that walks by, 60s, not completely withered away. But, you know, older but carries himself with much importance. Very expensive clothing, reds and blues. It seems like he's attempting to hold a social station, even though in his current location, society has crumbled. He doesn't really catch your attention as anyone you recognize, but the person to the left of him is a very familiar-looking elven man, with long brown hair slicked over and behind his ears. This is Drez Vina, who originally contacted you when you arrived in Westruun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy-- (whispers) That's Drez Vina!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's looking a little rough, too. This has not been the kindest time to any of these people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, should we go back to the group or tell them to come on in?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we have to go back to tell them to come on in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have earrings.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, yeah, that's true

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Hey, you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, what what what what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys! Hey Percy, pay attention.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah, yes. Hello. What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, guess who I'm looking at right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your brother.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: God, you're so good at that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Drez fucking Vina

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps) Drez!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, remind us, who-- ?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Drez Vina was that dude that sent us on our very first mission together, you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! He protected us, he's a magic user.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. I was mostly drunk that time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Percy you weren't there yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, at the Winter's Crest festival, I remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) That's not him at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. He was-- Drez Vina.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "That's not it at all." (chuckles)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy, you weren't there--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: MARISHA and TALIESIN (in unison): Oh. Abjurist Noja.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Drez Vina was the dick. Drez Vina's a dick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Drez Vina's the guy. Drez Vina was the asshole.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doesn't he work for someone else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He had a Master.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, was he the guy that we stole from, kind of?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, keep it down. I don't know who all can hear over these earrings!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, did he have the tower with the magical items?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here, I should step in here and clarify-- (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's been like three years.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This was only three years ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I know. Drez Vina came to you under the pretense that he was working for an individual called the Master, he called him his Master, who was interested in hiring your services. Originally sent you into the mage tower of Eskil Ryndarien, the Realmseer, to steal the brass box with the pearl top. However, you did not steal it and instead you ended up befriending the Archmage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He let us pick something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, he let you pick something from his array of items.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, to pay back your debt, he sent you guys to the Druid Barrow where you had to retrieve this cortex, this magical gem that was embedded in the center of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that was where we fought the golem!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Where you fought the golem. And you retrieved the cortex successfully, and that's the last you've seen of him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See? He likes us now! We totally helped him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But he has magical items--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, maybe not anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Had. Well, we should--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What was, DM, can you remind me the name of the mother that we spoke to all that time ago?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The one you just mentioned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Elowen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Elowen? Elowen. I'd rather go talk to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Elowen. Elowen Brist.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you guys want to just come on in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, let's go in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't see what the harm is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We go in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make a nice, pleasant chattering-- maybe you should sing, Scanlan, as you approach so that people know we're nice

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would love to sing. Oh. Right now? (singing) Sunny days, chasing the dragons away, On our way to where the air is clean, Can you tell me how to kill, How to kill some drag-eens?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a performance check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Performance check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it? What is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It fell off the table. And it is-- a six. But plus 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait-- plus 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus 14? Okay. Okay, so, as you guys begin strolling up, immediately you see torches (fire sounds).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hands up. No weapons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see guards come forward, two of them with nocked crossbows. "Who goes there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, you guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Crossbows--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) It's a magic carpet ride. Except we burned our magic carpet so we can't-- (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's your business?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, hey, that's not necessary. We're friends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Move along."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we're not looking for food. We're here to provide aid if we can, if it's in need, if people need our help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Persuasion? You?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While their crossbows are notched, they haven't lowered them completely, they're still on guard and still nervous of your approach.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We also think there's a woman with you named Elowen. She knows us. We'd like to speak to her. We'll wait here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the guards who was paying attention walks away and they all raise their crossbows again and just train them on you guys for the next few minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, it's really not necessary. Even if you were to loose those, it would just be a tickle. I mean, trust me, we come from Westruun, all right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you remember us? In Westruun?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Winter's Crest festival?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vox Machina?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grog? Pike? Wilhelm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the guards takes a moment and gives you an eye and just goes-- "I remember seeing you around town. You were-- Oh man, jeez, it's good to see you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right? I'm as psyched about all this--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry if I gave you any trouble back in the day. I was young and stupid."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you all lower your crossbows, for a second?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean no offense, but we're very guarded with your kind at the moment."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (inhales) Right. Yeah, yeah, understandable. Right. We just actually came from Westruun. It seems to be a bit occupied at the moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: LAURA. He's different than the other guys, see? He's got a beard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (stage-whispers) Would you shut up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point the guard that had left comes back with Elowen. She walks up with her tightly braided reddish hair with a little bit of grey on the sides, that probably has come since the last time you've seen her and the experience of having her child gone so long. It's taken a physical toll on her. But there is a smile on her face. Now she looks over and focuses her eyes--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Elowen!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's them! That's them! Let them in, let them in." And she runs forward immediately and gives a big hug to you, Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And starts moving through, and, you know, just this big smile and surprise. And you can see her little boy Simon come up to the side.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh! Simon!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Simon, who last time you saw, you were retrieving him from the pocket dimension that the Dread Emperor had called his domain. At which point, there's a few quick pleasantries, as she says hello again. She says: "Please, please come in. Please. It's fine. They're trustworthy." And the guards nod. And they follow behind, not in an aggressive way but just in a being-careful kind of way. So you have two people, two armed individuals flanking you the entire walk that you guys are doing, but it's at ease.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth goes up to Simon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How old are you now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This many-- " He puts up nine fingers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've grown up so well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I just give him a big hug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He freezes up. He's gotten a little shy at the interaction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I kneel down next to him and I say: do you want to see something cool? Look at this. And I take off the serpent belt. And-- (snake hisses)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Jesus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Really?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's my pet. Do you want to, he's gentle as a lamb. Do you want to tickle his neck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes." (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Here, you hold him. I set it down around his neck. Don't worry. Nothing's going to happen. It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He locks up again. Snakes and women have the same reaction to this poor little boy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Simon, fart in his ear. Go ahead and fart in his ear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives you a stern look. And the snake just wraps around him for a second.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth does a little wind gust and goes (poof).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reaches up and rubs his ear from the tickle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's good to see you again, kiddo. Come here, Simon Jr. I'll put him back, now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has a big smile on his face now. "That's so cool."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While that was happening, I pulled aside his mother. Is this everyone that made it out of Westruun?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) "Well, we're one group. Many went to Kymal, but they're at capacity now, and based on "many of the farming fields that were destroyed or burned by the dragon ransacking, there's only so "much food to go around, so they had to turn us away. But there were some small farming "communities along the river that were kind enough to take us in and we're... we're getting by."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you're searching for a home?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hoping to find out if anything takes care of the problems in Westruun. You should probably "talk to Cornelius. I don't know the details of everything happening."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cornelius. Is he the man I saw in the finer robes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He used to be the bookbinder in Westruun but when everything fell apart, he rose up and took the "lead in keeping everyone safe and so, I mean, he won't say it, but we kind of look to him as a "leader for now."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did he work in the Cobalt Reserve?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think he did business with them, but I don't think he worked directly with."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Here. Let me take you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wonderful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She walks over and, as you guys are talking to Simon, she scoops Simon up and pulls him to her side and gives you guys a smile of acknowledgement. "Come," and leads you guys--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're meeting Cornelius.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (softly) Who's Cornelius?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a bookbinder.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Never heard of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and let them in." The guard pulls open the tent, and at this point Elowen says, "I'm going to go get my son some food. If you need "anything, just ask around."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll see you again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's got a layer of just dirt and grime across his brow that tells you he's definitely one who gets in the thick of it when it's needed. And you can see why in this circumstance people put trust into a person that can rise up amongst all the chaos from simple means and prove themselves to want to help everybody. And in the moment he smiles, you immediately see also why people follow him. He's got this bright, toothy, white smile, and he puts his hand out immediately to each of you. "Pleasure "to meet you. I'm Cornelius."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vex'ahlia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, I'm told that you all are here to talk to me? What's this about?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We know that you've been driven out of your homes by an attack of dragon or dragons. How many have menaced your city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's when the savages came in and took what was "left. And I mean no offense to that. I recognize you; I've seen you around the town before. You "seem like you're not like your ilk."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. No, I'm sorry, I don't know who you are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's okay. No one really knows who I am and I want to keep it that way, when all this "blows over."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Understandable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't like all the attention."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long have you been nomadic for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're going into our second week now, I think. We sent a few of our most able-bodied up "north in hopes of trying to figure out if the city was safe to return to, and, well, only a few made "it back, and those that did said it was a bloodbath."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's quite dangerous there right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many do you have here, in your encampment with you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let's see." He kind of takes a moment to think and does couple marks on the dirt in front of him to do a count. You can see he's not a very numbers-guided person.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd say we got probably about close to 60, 70 people left. We used to have more. Then we lost "the scouting parties up north and, well, these past four days we've had a few of these orcish "fuckers been raiding the outskirts of our camp every night and taking goods, people--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's your current destination?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hah, we got none. We're just staying here and staying alive."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what made you camp out here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We can keep going east, but--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I could be selfish for a moment. Have you seen Wilhand? Pike, Pike Trickfoot. Her grandfather.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A small, older gnome?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We got a few older gnomes from the city. I don't think we have any among us though, no."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fine. Thought I'd ask.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we could help you relocate quite a ways away, would you be open to that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How do you mean?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a city. A lot of the refugees from other cities that have been destroyed by the dragons are finding their way there and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy actually has family who's in charge there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could give you safe passage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Possibly find you someplace to work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very quick, safe passage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can they account for 70 extra people in Whitestone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We lost a lot during the attack with the Briarwoods.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's room, but there's only-- We can maybe make room for a few more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's farmland, there are some empty buildings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate the offer, and--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It hasn't been touched by dragons yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hah. 'Yet.'"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I tell you what. We greatly appreciate the offer, and we're liable to take you up on that at "some point in the near future. But right now, we have too many of our people that are unaccounted "for to the south. We got a couple scouting groups who're trying to find out where these orcs are, "where they've taken them. See if we can retrieve our own before we go ahead and find a new place to live."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many are missing right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we lost 11 in the last few nights of exchange, to blade, and we've lost about nine to "the actual bands themselves, so. There's nine unaccounted for. We're hoping--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we found them, would you be more likely to take your people to somewhere safe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what is necessarily stopping you from at least sending a handful of women and children ahead? Families that don't need to be nomadic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you have the means to keep them safe for that kind of travel? That's a long way, up to "Whitestone. We don't have the guards to keep them up on that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have very safe means of travel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A shortcut, one would say.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They'd be there in an instant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know anything about any of that weird magic stuff, but you seem like a reliable group."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can tell we're a motley bunch of assholes. We've seen shit and we've done shit and we can do shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ain't that the truth. Well--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'd also like to talk to you, perhaps, to see if you've seen some shit. We're actually looking for something out here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are. Well, you've been travelling, we're looking for a creature who may have what we need to help defeat these dragons.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Possibly a bit deeper into the Frostweald.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Into the Frostweald?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's where we're thinking our scouts are saying these orcs are holed up, anyway."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's useful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "At least, that's where we've been sending our folk. And follow them out there. Only one "group went in after them and they never came back, so--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No one's returned who's come back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's how we know they're there. But they were "just a scouting party. They got to the outskirts and came back."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we speak to them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Going to get more information. Sorry."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that works out well, then. We can go up that direction, perhaps take care of this problem, possibly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's on the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wouldn't mind a good stretch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kill some orc.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I could use some breathing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you know your way around the Frostweald at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can't say I do. But I do have some stake in this personally, if you don't mind me asking. We "don't have much to offer you, at all, really, other than my gratitude. Tell of a few friends of "ours that've found their way wherever these savage creatures are stationed. One of the individuals "that was taken in a raid two nights ago was my brother, Cyrus. Don't know if he's still amongst "the living, but if you are indeed planning on taking a look at where these orcs are and bring "folks back safe, if you could just keep an eye out for him?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'll tell you, in times like these, it will feel good to be able to do a bit of good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hear, hear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does your brother look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's about 15 years younger than me. Shaggy brown hair, bit of a puffy goatee. He looks like a "lazy man. He is a lazy man, but I love him. If you're looking for someone who's hiding in the "corner, shaking in their boots, it's probably him."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Understood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Check the corners.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's his defense mechanism."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) A very safe one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hope." His eyes go a little colder at that moment. "I hope."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not afraid to go in there again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we take the evening to rest, and first thing in the morning, head out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would there be any injured members of your camp that would want to head out in the morning to Whitestone? Somebody that needs any medical attention?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've got plenty of folks who aren't feeling too well. Illness and disease, "unfortunately, tend to go hand-in-hand with these type of nomadic lifestyles. We can probably-- "about seven or eight people that could use some relatively immediate attention. Couple survivors "of the recent raids. If you can indeed do this, you might be saving some lives, here."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we camping the rest of the night?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's wise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we promise you no one will bother you tonight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Question. Question. Can I do my Transport via Plants as a ritual cast to not burn a slot level?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I thought.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would say it next to the spell. Ritual.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I thought. Okay. Keyleth spends the rest of the evening burning up my remainder spell slots to do curing on those who need it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys are given a relatively ramshackle tent in which you can sleep for the evening, cooked fish-- that's about all they have to offer-- with a few leftover potatoes that appear to have been recently either located amongst their remaining crates, you have no idea, but a passable meal is presented if you'd like, and a place that has cloth over your head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I don't need to sleep tonight. I'll be on the watch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we scour the camp for her grandfather?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sleeping tonight. I don't know what's wrong with him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know he said there were no gnomes, but--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's only 60 people. I feel like he'd know with 60.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's like this many, like--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it's not a lot of gnomes. I'm assuming it's a handful of gnomes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. I just, I don't know. I wish Pike were here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, me too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Always wish Pike was here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do recall, last time you were in Whitestone, you left the other half of your gatestone with Pike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll write a letter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll write a letter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll write a letter that will travel with them to Whitestone and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, that's a good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's wonderful, and she can pop over.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hm. Take about a minute.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we'd have to send them tonight, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, in the morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They could go in the morning and just go find her immediately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, could task someone to find her immediately and then, as soon as she gets the message, she'll beam to us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've still got the other one. Right here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great. We take the night, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I write a letter to my sister, letting her know that I do apologize that we're sending more people, but it's necessary, and I write her a letter insisting that Pike be sent here by stone immediately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) D-E-A-R C-A-S-S, how are you? I'm fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck are you singing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) Everybody else is too!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow! You know what I'm doing!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit, what the fuck just happened?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are a nerd!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A theatre nerd, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you are a theatre nerd.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Secret Garden, ladies and gentlemen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Secret Garden: The Musical. It's magical.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we have the break so Taliesin and I can go make out in the other room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't go on break for that! Just move your seating arrangement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What injured people are going back? Have we met these people yet? Can we meet them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't met them, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go find the injured.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whether it be having to eat whatever was around to stay alive but some of the food had spoiled in travel, or just catching disease as when you have clusters of people in cold environments, especially cold, wet environments like this tonight. It does tend to happen. Nothing seriously life-threatening, but, you know, definitely worrisome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I try to find the one who's the most able-bodied. Right? We're going to need someone to go find Pike or deliver a message, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to be whoever's organizing it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is someone going who's not injured to transport these people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly. And you can organize whoever you'd like. Someone you know, you could bring along.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I start attending to the children first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you tend to the children, helping them feel comfortable, deal with any wounds, scrapes, relative inconveniences, and it's easy enough for you to take a moment to cure disease if need be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we find any families with children and maybe see if there's able bodies in there that we could send through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, you manage to-- and with Elowen and her son Simon as well--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Maybe Elowen could go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Elowen would be perfect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, remember, we were able to get about 25 or so people through last time with the spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many sick people are there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see about seven or eight people that could use it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can get a bunch of other folks through as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I talk to Elowen and ask if she can go find Pike in the morning, if she wants to go through, and all that kind of stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd be happy to, I--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You remember what Pike looks like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. About your size, lightish hair--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hair the color of the sunset, eyes like waves that crash in the night, breasts, supple, firm--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, Scanlan. Scanlan.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right. Yes, I remember. I'll find her, yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Smell of morning dew as it touches--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, I think we should turn in for the evening, but yes, I'll be happy to take care of it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also of note, you're going to be going through a tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just go with it. You're going to be--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you know, you didn't have to tell them that now. Could've just let it be a surprise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really fun, actually.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's kind of frightening, though, if you don't know it's coming.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll pop right out in Whitestone. It's amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's still a little weird for me, to be honest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it? Okay, that's good to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. All right." So, as the evening comes to completion, you're taking guard for the course of the evening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pop Trinket out and I sleep on him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very attentive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear sound) He curls up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hugs and hugs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Warm, fuzzy. Trinket makes for a very good bed for one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to curl into the butt end, which is all I get. All I ever got while we were traveling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. He farts on you all the time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I fart on him all the time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a fart exchange. Back and forth, forever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bada-lang-lang-lang-lang-lang-lang-lang.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) That got weird. Did you want to do anything for the evening?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh crud. Big two!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ey-oh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ey-oh! (exploding sounds)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What would you have seen? What would you have seen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all come to consciousness. You eventually get your rest as well for the evening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What didn't you see? Tell me what you didn't see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, the tent city is back to a bustling sound of folks going about their business for the day, what kind of business that can be done. The people that you've requested be sent over to Whitestone have been gathered on the outside, the western side of this small city area, and some of the guards there are prepared to greet you in preparation for sending these people over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, before we do this, there are no trees here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? What do you mean? Are there trees here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's a plain. I mean, there are the occasional small tree, scattered in clusters around, but you're in the grasslands.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought we were on the edge of a forest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's no forest here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The forest is south of you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got to walk them to the forest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How fucking far are trees?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say, probably--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four days' journey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, from this area, it's most of a day's travel. There are trees closer, but the forest is that far.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need a person-width tree.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A giant tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To find a tree large enough to do this is probably going to be about two hours' walking distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, we can walk for two hours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a nice morning hike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what, I'm going to fly up. I'm going to (hacking spit) and fly up and find a fucking tree.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you're going to scout?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to scout for a tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why did you pick that as the word?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't think about it. I forgot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a great decision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. You find, actually, hiding just around the bend of a series of small hills that butt up against the southwestern side of the Foramere Basin, there is a small cluster of trees, one of which is the largest of the group, that may function as a function of this that is only about a 30-minute walk from these.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's doable. There we go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fly back down and I tell them. I look along the path, though, and make sure it's safe, the walking back. Is it okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hopefully nobody saw the comely half-elf flying through the bright blue sky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wear turquoise to blend in with the blue surroundings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't blend in too well, as when you crested over, a number of the families and kids that were prepared were pointing up. "Mom, she's flying!" People were excited to see you take off into the distance. It was quite a display. Well done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do some circles around and wave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe you can join Dr. Dranzel in the circus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hang off of it as I come down, like woo! And then come back up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a dexterity check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dexterity or acrobatics?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dexterity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Outstanding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I said as I come down. It was low. I was low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as Vex takes a moment to do some unique tricks with her elaborate and long-running experience directing brooms across the sky, she gets a bit cocky and does a "look, ma, no hands" moment. However, in doing so, the broom sputters out from under the grasp of her legs, and suddenly goes limp as it begins to fall almost as fast as you are, as you both begin to plummet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I grab for it! And (hacking spit) as I'm grabbing for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can't fight the power of the one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, you don't have any momentum to go forward, and it's already coasted about 15, 20 feet away from you, and there's nowhere to swim. All the kids are like, "Yay!" Cheering, and all of a sudden you start falling, and they go (screaming). And starts yelling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which child in the crowd is going to become Robin? I'm so excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I want you to go ahead and roll an acrobatics check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is how we make a vigilante.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, okay. So you only suffer nine points of falling damage as you hit the ground and do a tumble, land arms out and catch the broom, smiling amongst the serious pain in your legs and back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll bet you thought I was really falling!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the kids are like, "Yay!" And start cheering, clapping. Even the parents start clapping. The guards start clapping, like, "That was genuinely impressive." Played it off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does the broom just fall, or does it shoot off like a missile?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It shoots off for a second, carrying the momentum of the propulsion, and then it falls limp as it no longer has the immediate connection with the person. But she did catch it after she tumbled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay, that's cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Working on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to work on that trick, you guys, and it's going to be amazing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's perfect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Blood for the blood gods.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Finding the tree, you guys walk, and bringing the families and the children and the people that were chosen to go to Whitestone, Keyleth, you create your Transport via Plants spell. (whoosh) The doorway opens, and it barely fits onto this one half-dead willow that's cresting the side there. Everyone (gasps).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We form the line, the ranks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Climb through, climb through, you have to move quickly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go, go, go, go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the very end, Elowen's the last one through, and she's holding the letter and she looks back and says, "Promise," and leaps through right as it closes in the tree. You look toward the guards that were with you guys, who are just watching this whole thing with their eyes wide open.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Glad you let us in, aren't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn to him and I go, high five! Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you see two figures walking towards you at this southern forest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two figures walking towards us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Towards you guys, rather hastily.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I draw my whip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Whip's out. You glance over and, easy enough to see, it is Drez Vina and this older individual, both rushing up. Drez has his hand up. "Excuse me, I'm sorry, pardon me!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, hello? Hello?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It has been some time, everyone. Pleasure to see you again."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We remember, dear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wondrous, wondrous. I'm here with--" And as he gestures, the old man puts his hand in front and goes, "Would you please just let me talk for once? Hello. I am--" And he looks over. "Has he "been giving you my-- I am Master Quall. Pleasure to meet all of you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Quall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was the collector that had hired you in previous times as Drez has recently made me aware, "and while our track record has been spotty, you seem to be rather able-bodied, and whispers this "morning that have come to my ears mention that you have interest in returning to Westruun. Is that correct?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To set it free, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Drez goes, "Yes, well, you see, the master here "lives within Westruun, and-- " "I'm talking, I've got this. My abode, which is a relatively humble "structure, two stories, bricks and dark wood, southeast of the town square, right by the "fountain crossroads, I'm sure you've seen it before. Since this whole endeavor has happened, it "has usurped a bit of progress in my experimentation, and I would be remiss if I didn't "request your assistance in perhaps retrieving a very important piece of my collection so I might "continue this research in this desolate place."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are the subjects of your experimentation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Various things. I enjoy finding out the base elements of existence and life."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's lying. 18.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God damn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whispers!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dagger Dagger Dagger is one of the shirts that's available. There's Strongjaw Ale. Strongjaw Ale available for sale. Check it out. Geek and Sundry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's very interesting. Did you know that I'm a collector as well, actually?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Really? Oh, quaint."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of specifics.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of what?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Specifics. I see that you have not really handed any over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It may be a bit beyond your understanding."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very few things are beyond his understanding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. I appreciate the synergies between various elements and the ability to link "the essence with that of a living organic entity, or the transition of such living essence into what "is normally non-living matter."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you're a necromancer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No! I don't deal with that ridiculous stuff."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's talking about transmutation of some kind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, yes! Thank you. The transitioning of essences or sparking essence within what was once "non-living matter. I'm talking about elements, I'm not talking about flesh."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like natural elements?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like golems.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the veganism of necromancy. It's just kind of dull.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What was that?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you could retrieve that for me, I would make it "quite worth your while and be ever-grateful and in your service."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are we talking about, a pile of coin, or something else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As I said before, I am quite the collector, and while I do hate to relinquish my grasp on "various parts of this collection, for someone who does me a grand favor, I am willing to look the "other way as one might disappear."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does the circlet do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's more of an experimental piece."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's obviously something very worthwhile. You would have a better chance with us if you're honest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Drez at this point steps forward and goes, "I would appreciate if you respected the master "for his research. He is going to offer you a great guide."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shut up, Drez.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you're an asshole. You're the biggest asshole. I'm not talking to you. I'm talking to you. I'm not talking to you, I'm talking to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "About time someone called you on it."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Master Quall. We're looking for the Vestiges of Divergence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, what the fuck?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, am I not supposed to say that? Do you know where those are? That's what we want. If you can offer us one of those, we'll do business with you. Otherwise, we're going to fuck off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Finish what you were saying first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. I've heard of this title before. You say you're seeking them, are you?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am. Not them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where are you seeking these? Whereabouts are you off to?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we were headed towards--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't know where they are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're trying to figure that out right now. We're not exactly sure. We're not exactly sure, Keyleth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We thought you might know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How is what we're seeking less important than where we're seeking it? I'm really confused.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you know, just in case we mention where we might be looking for them, in front of these people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because what if he goes to find them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't worry."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he look like the man capable of going and finding things? He's trying to send us back into his own god damn basement to get his own shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "See, there is a woman who speaks both her mind and a mind of quite acute truth."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She is cute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it morning yet? Can Pike come join us yet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She is being sought.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this conversation, there's a little (crackling) flash of divine energy before you, and a slight popping sound as out of the middle of the air next to you, there comes, jogging in, a freshly winded, fully armored Pike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What an entrance!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See, you start arguing and you just make a gnome. This is what happens.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I run over and I pick up Pike and I spin her around in a big bear hug.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, my little buddy Pike. We missed you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I missed you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi, Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey guys! Oh, who are these two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, Master Quall is going through a series of notes. He goes, "I'm very certain this "gnome was not created."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you remember Drez.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, yes. Mr. Vina. Drez Vina.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. It is a delight to see you as well, small one."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, this grew very complicated."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Master Quall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's lay the cards on the table. If we find this thing of yours in your basement, and if we go to your home, we are certainly going to go into the basement and find it now regardless, we're going to figure out what it is before we give it to you anyway. The world is dangerous right now, and it is not appropriate to just be handing mystical artifacts of great strength willy-nilly to anybody who asks. The world is dangerous and we need to make sure that power is flowing in the correct direction. Now, you can either be forthright with that and get your property, or we can find it in your basement and experiment on it until we know what it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good luck even attempting such an endeavor."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have very good luck attempting these endeavors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. Let's just say that it's a device that, when completed, to the specialty of my own "training and studies, would enable me the means of personal defense to get me through these rather "difficult and dangerous times. As I am not getting any younger and it seems that we're having "entities of great power and mischief intent on destruction continuously tearing down my very "doorways--" He looks off in the direction of Westruun. "I would feel more comfortable if I "could keep myself well guarded. And that is what this circlet is intended to provide."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell you what, Master Quall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not heading there now, but we'll be going back, and when we do, we will find your home, and we will search out this circlet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, hold on, before we just say no, what's the reward? Do we know what you're paying for this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, he's got a collection.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A simple trade of my collection. You bring me one of my items, and I gift you one of mine as well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I personally feel this is reasonable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm curious if you could be more beneficial in paying us with information. With knowledge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As well as something from your collection.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am more than willing to offer information for trade. It is quite a grand trade indeed. If "that is acceptable."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we would want something as well, physically.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a deposit of information.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Then, as part of the deposit, what do you require of me?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you familiar with a sphinx named Osysa?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can't say that I am."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Resides up-- No?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What does he know, perhaps, of the-- no?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you familiar with any other sphinxes that reside in this area? Do you know the address?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, but they don't really wander in open daylight."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know where they wander?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In darkness, if they don't wander in open daylight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives a curious look at both of you. "I am not a master of mythology. I do not know of "such entities and where they might reside or exist. I apologize."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you do seem to be a master of items. We are looking for certain special Vestiges.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you say. And you're saying this sphinx may want to help you in this endeavor?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're not sure yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a long walk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We thought maybe he could help us find them, but maybe you could be of a similar service.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. What I do have--" And he turns around. "Come with me to my tent, please. I may "have something that can be of service to you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give Pike a hug as we walk to his tent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Actually, I pull Pike aside and say-- Well, not aside. I just ask her, how's Whitestone? What's going on there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, it's okay. I think I got to the point where I couldn't build anymore, heal any more people. I needed a little adventure. But everything is as you would think it would be.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No dragon attacks?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: None at the moment. We've been trying to hold down the place as much as we can, and getting there seems to be okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did not go up to Pike. I hung way the fuck back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys eventually make your way back to the small outpost, at this point, to the tent of Drez Vina and Master Quall. Master Quall steps inside. You hear him rummaging through some things. Something rolls and breaks, and you hear, "Oh, damn it!" from the inside. He comes back out and goes, "All right, so, this." And he holds up this small glass bauble. The inside has a spinning, looks like a brass gyroscope-type interior. He goes, "This item, when clasped and "concentrated on, should light up any sort of nearby magical incantations or enchantments. This, "if you are in the presence of such objects as you are seeking, should be quite helpful in locating "their presence.
