lines.text: Constitution save.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's a save! That's right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a 14 plus seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's great!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I look at it in the eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You stare it down and it kind of (snarls).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (barks) Bark it down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Orthax has left his mark on you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. I cast Hex on it. I'm looking at the one she's Hunter's Marked, I cast Hex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, nice!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you gonna bark all day, little doggie?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Same one that she's Hunter's Marked?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. And I'm taking... I'm giving it a disadvantage on willpower ability checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to take three shots with Sharpshooter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 12. Misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, goodbye! Going to the good die, 12.... Better! 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the Hex damage as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god! I'm sucking. 22 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 points of damage. So the first shot goes wide. Second shot goes wide again. For some reason, it's moving faster than you expected at this moment, missing your sights. The third shot manages to find the front of its nose and (shattering) the front of its skull shatters and it kind of crumbles to the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, while shooting, I ran from that one tree all the way to the other one. That was a running shot, so...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you run this way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was a lot harder the last time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Behind the tree over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here? Because you can only get about that far with your running.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: About there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there? Okay. Then you got behind there. That's fine. All right, that ends your turn, Percy. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I would like to run at that little bastard right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Grog voice) I can't see you but I'm so angry!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm using my Feral-- no, that's wrong. I'm using my... what the fuck is it called?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Slap Fight. Hair Pull.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've totally forgotten what's it called. What the fuck is it? Reckless Attack!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, there you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. So can I cancel out the disadvantage and get just a normal roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you would have a normal roll on this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! And Great Weapon Master on these two strikes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit! Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whoosh)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yells) (laughs) Shit! Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a bad luck night for Grog rolling!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush forward (sword swinging). You thought it was there, you're sure it was there, you heard it hiss. It's about two inches below where you swung.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm so mad that I come out of my rage because I don't hit anything, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to hit it. You have to attack. There's a difference.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I've been swinging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. (laughs) Ending Grog's turn, Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many are left? Two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am remembering what the basilisks did last time, and I've only done this once before, and am going to go...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avert your gaze or not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm looking down and transforming into a giant scorpion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Scorpions are fascinating.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How so? They don't have eyes, or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, they have blindsight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what does that mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It means they don't use their eyes to see things. They have blindsight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Scanlan, as you're averting your gaze, you glance over as Keyleth goes (poof) into this giant scorpion, big tail, big pincers, black and red carapace. It's upsetting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm scared.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (clicking pincers)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's really upsetting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where are they? The two are kind of in the middle there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One's next to Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to move in between them and I'm going to do a multiattack on both of those. I'll start on the one that Grog's not focusing on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I have three attacks, two with my claws and one with my stinger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do it. Disadvantage on all attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you averted your gaze.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I didn't. I have blindsight as a scorpion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but at the start of your turn, before anything happens, is when it happens. Did you avert your gaze or not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I turned into a scorpion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before that happened, at the start of your turn, did you avert your gaze or not?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You said you averted your gaze.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I said I looked down, but once I'm a scorpion, I have blindsight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but the effect takes place before your transformation happens. So, yes or no, do you want to take the advantage or not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I said I looked down and turned into a scorpion to try and avoid it, so... I mean, I did, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so disadvantage on the attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's the whole reason I did the scorpion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it's also looking cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay, from here on out, you're fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a three, it misses again. Nope, that's a two. Last one is an eight, plus a four... So that's 12. Probably still nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me think here for a second. The scorpion has blindsight?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Starring Ashley Johnson! Blindsight!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How did we not walk into that? How have we been sitting here and that didn't happen?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That legitimately made me spit my fucking coffee in my face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're right. I was thinking more in terms of it averting the magical power of the basilisk, but you could still avert and blindsight would allow you to still know where it is without having the disadvantage, so yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Although with coffee in the eye, disadvantage is back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is true. I'll let you reroll those attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All three? Okay, I wish I remembered them. Do you want me to reroll all three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just reroll all three. That's on me. I was thinking in wrong terms.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, you're the worst.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. I know, I am the worst.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jeez, I'm going to tweet at you later about this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually Matt, how blindsight works...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've already been sent, I'm sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm shutting the fuck up now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These are just straight, they don't have disadvantage? First attack, 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 does not hit, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second attack was a natural 18, so 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit. And for the tail?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For the tail, 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 hits. That was my bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a bunch of idiots dorking around, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is coffee everywhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three damage, and they have to take a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, what's the DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so it makes the save.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, Keyleth, good one!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, they take 4d10 poison, and on a failed save, they take half as much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so roll 4d10.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 4d10 is a lot!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should be a scorpion all the time!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks guys! Wow, these are fucking horrifying rolls. Six, seven, eight, nine, plus seven is 16 points of poison damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total, so that would be eight for half of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that is halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice, that's not bad at all. All right, so as your first claw streaks off its armor, the second one grabs hold and-- hold on a second.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm listening!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, it was eight damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you did, because you did half the dice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, she did 4d10.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She did 4d10?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight damage, all right. All right, so as the first claw streaks across its armor, second one manages to grab and actually pince onto it, dealing some damage. As you're holding it there, the tail strikes inward, manages to pierce the outside of the scaly basilisk hide. Not as effective as it could've been, but still you see its body tense with the sudden pulse of poison in its system. That brings us to Pike! What's up?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Since I can't see it, is there any way that I can Guiding Bolt one of the basilisks without hurting anybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, but for Guiding Bolt I believe it's a spell attack roll. Am I correct on that? Or does it automatically hit? I'm trying to remember which one it is. You guys have so many spells. Guiding Bolt, yeah. You can totally Guiding Bolt. You'll have disadvantage on the attack roll, but you can do it still.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it, Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, let's do it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and roll with disadvantage on the attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which one, the one near Grog or the one near scorpion-face?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Which one would I not hurt anybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not so much you hurting anybody, you wouldn't hit anybody. It's about if you miss or not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog and I can take it anyway.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The one by Grog.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, we'll do the one by Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it's with disadvantage, so you have to roll it again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Say it again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One in 20 chance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, unfortunately, as you're holding your eyes at bay--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait! You're inspired!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can add the inspiration dice if you want to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'll add inspiration!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so roll a d10 and add that to the attack. 13 plus...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay. All right, seven. So 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage on Guiding Bolt. So 4d6 radiant damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay... 17!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice, all right! 17 points of radiant damage, and now there is a glowing hue of radiant light around it, so even though you're not looking at it, it's a pretty decent beacon, so it gives advantage on the next attack roll against it. Keep that in mind. Do you want to move at all or do you want to stay where you are, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll stay, yeah, I'll stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Now it is their turn. This one turns around and it's going to go ahead and make a bite attack against you, Keyleth, in scorpion form. That's a 17, plus six?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You take 11, plus three. 14 points of piercing damage, plus seven points of poison damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So that was 21?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My brain is not doing numbers for some reason.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, and I keep looking at you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has advantage on you because you're averting your gaze, plus you had your reckless attack last round. It still only rolls a nine, plus six, so that's 14? 15 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one bites out towards you, and even though it's not there, because it's so bright, you see it shift, and you (boom) hit it in the front of its snout with the base of your sword. That brings us to the top of the initiative order. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome. So it's the glowing one, I get advantage on the attack, because it's glowing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to Hunter's Mark it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Hunter's Mark moves over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to avert my gaze, and roll a regular attack then? Since it's advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. It cancels out the disadvantage. So roll your first attack against it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31 hits, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 15 plus Hunter's Mark-- Oh, I didn't Hunter's Mark it.

lines.name: MATT, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay! What did I say, 15? 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, all right. So the first arrow strikes into it. It's still standing. It's looking a little hurt, but it's still standing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then do I still get regular attacks? This is at disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage on the next one, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. What's your total? 19 with disadvantage? That does hit, yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, all right. This arrow, however, manages to strike through the top of the head, stapling the mouth shut, and it falls to the ground as its eyes slowly glaze over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I roar from up in the tree!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, do you let go of the broom to roar?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I hold the broom in my hand!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Katy Perry style.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Defying Gravity style.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holding it in your hand while you're flying on it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not flying, I'm in a tree, dude.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she's clutched up on top of a tree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not looking at you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that brings us to Scanlan. Are you averting your gaze or not?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not only averting my gaze, I'm looking towards the holes that it came out of, any of the holes that are near me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's two that are near you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to go over to one and throw a Fireball down into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! So, Scanlan, you walk over to the nearby holes behind you, where the one that snuck up behind you essentially came out of, aim down, and make sure you mark off these charges for each use of the wand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You (whoosh) release the beam, which gets about 15, 20 feet down before it blasts. I need you to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like putting yourself at the mouth of a cannon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll 8d6. But take half damage, because it's mostly guarded and this is a circumstantial, at the outskirts of it, you're not taking the full brunt of the Fireball. However, you do get caught in the very edge of the backblast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take half that. So you take 15 points of fire damage and are blown about five feet backward onto the ground. However, the ground shudders beneath all your feet, and the earth, the wet damp earth (squelch) sinks inward and the tunnel collapses. A few of the others (squelch) into it. There's still a couple more on the opposite side that are open. There's two more on this side that are open.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So the tunnels nearest me are not accessible anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two that were there and there both, the ground from it shuddering, collapsed inward, and now the mud has filled the space. There's these small sinkholes where they were.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'll spend the rest of my time in this round licking my wounds and studying the obelisk to see if I can see any other clues or anything on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You can see the text that she saw upon there, the Elvish script.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't read it, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you see it there, and you see the triangle, a dark recessed triangle about that big that is in the base of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a hole, or is it...?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a hole, but it's carved. It's not a perfect triangle, it starts as a triangle and slowly, as it recesses inward, comes to a point towards the back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like a reverse pyramid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I throw a snowball in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impact)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's safe, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I'm off the map, but I want to try to come down towards the tree that I think Percy's at. He's between two trees. I'm going to avert my gaze, I'm going to look at the ground, come up around the side of that tree, and I'm listening for scorpion clacking and basilisk hissing, and I'm going to throw, dagger dagger dagger, in the direction of the basilisk I hear near scorpion claws clutching. Does that make sense?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. So this is at disadvantage because I'm looking at the ground. So first one is... first one is a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And second one is... 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Third one is 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. These are not with Sharpshooter?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, not at all. So we've got ten, plus nine, plus ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, your final dagger hits in the side of its rib cage, and the creature slumps over on the ground, letting out a horrible, gurgling hiss as it slowly dies amongst the mud.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Daredevil.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was that all of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, yes. Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Oh, I roll with advantage, because I'm in the forest! Oh my god, I rolled a one twice in a fucking row. I see nothing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two natural ones?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are fucking eating it on rolls tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're about to look down to inspect the vicinity. However, the tree is starting to bow forward and you (grunt) have to catch yourself, and you have no chance to even survey the territory.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pine sap gets in your eye.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Laura Bailey dies on stream.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rolled a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you take a moment, the rage still in, you can hear the blood pumping in your ears, but you also hear the (hiss) rising hissing, what sounds like a distant echo coming up from a subterranean tunnel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Subterranean tunnel?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. That Fireball, I think it might have pissed them off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I use my blindsight tremorsense to see if I can feel how far away they are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. You feel beneath the ground. It's less of a tremorsense, more being able to sense the vibrations in the air around you. You can tell that there is motion coming from underneath.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sounds like a lot of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few more.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fireball the other holes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to drop my scorpion form.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, god, Keyleth, you're horrible! Oh, wait, no, you've turned back to normal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The things you say, Scanlan. I'm just going to do a Wall of Stone, flat over the area with the holes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So from the stone chunks and portions of the shattered bodies that litter part of this garden, a giant stone wall forms around them and builds over it, sealing these holes. Eventually you hear a (knocking) (reptilian snarl) scraping sounds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're friendly!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "I can't breathe down here!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not budging it, they're just hitting it from underneath, and it's getting more frantic as time goes on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long can you hold that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'll last until they bust out of it, so we either keep moving or figure out where we're going from here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is this obelisk? It seems important if these things are protecting it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it say?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It has writing in Elvish in it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does it say?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It says, a name is earned, in Elvish.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we say a name to it and see what happens?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the stone parts of the wall begins to crack from underneath.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't Osysa say something about, her mate wouldn't say its name?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's right, that's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And this is a symbol of Ioun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we say Ioun in Elvish?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say Ioun in Elvish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You say it out into the air.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you say it into this triangle hole over here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ioun!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Say knowledge in Elvish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Knowledge!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Elvish is just English except muffled.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going in the triangle hole!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A moment passes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Osysa! Sphinx!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A name is earned.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's in the hole?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's in the hole?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what's in the hole. Nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A basilisk face bursts through the stone wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whack-a-Mole! Grog! Whack-a-Mole!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I run over and play golf?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Do you want to avert your gaze or not?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Without an issue, the eyes find yours and you just grin as you bring... what kind of attacks do you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless and Great Weapon Master.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a natural 20. I'll take that one on the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and the other one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. The first is a critical. This would be over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you roll the... Is that times two?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that's just the attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's critical.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before you add your modifier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before the modifier? It was 12 before the modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 24 plus the modifier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which is 32, plus ten is 42.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 42. Did you roll the additional brutal critical rolls?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll 4d6 on top of that, because of your brutal critical. I think it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we can all agree it's the jelly of the month club at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For a grand total of...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you double those ones though, because it's the dice?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's just the first hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, all right. 59 points of damage. You square up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Happy Gilmore-style.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immediately, blood begins to pour out of its side, and it's gurgling at its attempt to try and push through. You wedge the blade out. Go for your next strike. You already rolled your attack, which was a 19, so roll damage on that one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven, 12, 20, 30, on the second one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the second strike, you (whoosh) clean slice. The head (splat) onto the stonework there, the body still wedging the hole shut. The neck is a clean cut, and starts gouting blood out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I dip the tip of the sword into the little well and I pick up the head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, by the way, both saving throws were failed, so you gain another plus two to strength.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, you're catching up to Pike!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ow! Nothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you cut yourself on your cup?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I just hit my tooth.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I hate that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you can feel the impact still attempting from beneath growing more and more frantic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say, earned!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I go collect some of the (stuttering) basilisk-- I can't say that. Can I get some of the blood and collect it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. And you notice that the longer it stays out there, the blood itself is beginning to freeze in the general atmosphere and get slushy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can get some and put it in my bag. It keeps things good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I stab the carcass then in another area and get some fresh in the body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there's plenty of carcasses of basilisks around. As they're inspecting, and you still feel the impacts from underneath the stone wall from the other tunnel, you manage to gather, we'll say two small vials of basilisk blood.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Vex!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, put it in Vex's little refrigerator Bag of Holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The slamming on the other side of the stone wall slowly subsides until silence comes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did they give up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Has anybody put their hand in the hole yet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's all you, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, I put my hand in the hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where the one you killed is?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, the triangle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing happens.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to take my Ioun Stone and shove it in the hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You take the Ioun Stone and place it in the hole, and it has a soft light that it gives off naturally from the magical enchantment, and it lights the inside of the dark recess, and as you place it inside, the top of the obelisk begins to glow ever-so-faintly, like a little beacon. The very top of the stone glows a matching color to your stone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A matching color?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. I need you all to make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ashley Blindsight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You catch a little bit of this, Grog, and you perk up as you notice, and you see immediately. There is a matching beacon, a faint glow that appears to be streaking down the mountainside in the distance. It's a little bit off-center from the direct south direction that you're facing, but there is a slight marker, very faintly visible on the mountain range, just visible over the treetops.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I drop a pin in that, and I tell Keyleth, now you can use that thing!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hold up the Hunk of Quall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I mean your spell, Keyleth. Fastest way to get to this point!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't bring it because everyone said not to learn that spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was today, wasn't it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you already learned it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He said to learn something else because it wasn't going to be useful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he said just don't use that thing!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you said to learn something, it was at the beginning of the day!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can't unlearn things! It's all good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay, it's okay. I can see it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had it already memorized when you guys got to the edge of the forest, I'm pretty sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I thought you were saying to pick something else because it wouldn't be handy. But I take it back, and I'll use it now if you want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we're good. We're good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so confused.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it me tonight?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is a really weird pot of coffee. It's not just you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I need sleep? What am I missing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can keep it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just lick your finger and stick it in the wind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just use the spell and pretend that you never unlearned it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I never unlearned it! It's been there the whole time! I didn't use it. It's not like I used a 6th-level spell. Look, guys! Find the Path! That way!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So what is it that you're focusing on for the spell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That beam of light!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That I pointed out to her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That she pointed out. Am I doing this wrong?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're not doing it wrong! You cast the spell and, concentrating on the source of this beacon, you feel the direction that would pull you the best way to travel towards that beacon is to travel towards that beacon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look, you're just doing what the bossy half-elf told you to do. Just go with it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What, that one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the only bossy half-elf here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: DM, can I experiment and take away, if I take away my Ioun Stone, does the light fade?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull the Ioun Stone out of it, the beacon does fade, yes. But you have a direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, that counts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. No matter where you travel in this place, you will have a directional position towards that beacon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See, there we go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking handy, that one is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, redemption.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Totally a great 6th-level spell I'm going to use all the time going forward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here we go. And we're moving.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We take off at a jog now!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, before we leave, is there anything else we need to do here? Do we need to go down into the tunnels? Do we need to piss on the obelisk? Do we want to do anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You should piss on the obelisk just to be sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should lick it, too, after you piss on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys leaving?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we need some basilisk blood and stuff!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got some!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're standing amongst the obelisk, a long series of mud with a bunch of mostly together stone statues of people and pieces of people around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we want to check the other building ruins? We didn't check those at all. There's a whole corner of a building over there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, go check it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go look at it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Half-elves look at the building structure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the hot holy fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It says it was forged by dwarves, that's all I can understand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Investigation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're stepping over the remnants of the stone individuals on the ground, you catch your eye on one of the individuals you see, lying partially submerged in the snow and mud. You glance down and see two arms that are out like this, although the right arm from the elbow down is missing. It's broken off in stone. Both are reaching out. A young human male, shortish brown hair, spectacles at the end of his nose, thin body and tucked-in, nice buttoned shirt. Slacks. This is Tyriok, the mapmaker.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're a terrible person.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, why would you do that, Matthew?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I didn't do this! He was travelling the world to take notes, people!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take... Wait! Everybody shush! I look at him for a moment and then I leave him, and I don't tell anyone else.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have Pike with us!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't tell anyone else. Pike didn't see him. His arm is broken off! You don't fucking know he exists. He's gone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But, but!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's terrible!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't you two just write a sequel to Batman/Superman while you're at it? Just destroy everything. I don't care anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could heal him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. Eventually, after you guys do a perusal of the ruins, you find your way back to the party and you guys continue travelling which way, towards the beacon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Towards the beacon!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got it in my head now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait, I go to Pike. I go to Pike. Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah? Hi, Vax!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you remember that mapmaker? Were you with us? So much shit has happened. Do you remember Tyriok the mapmaker?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't think I was with you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you fix stoning? Can you fix a man who's been turned to stone?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can try. Remember one time we fixed Vex, when she was turned to stone, the last time we fought the basilisks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two years ago, yeah. What did we do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We covered her in basilisk blood.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need to take a walk. Could you do that? Could you do that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sure. Which stone is he?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look over there by that tree there. Do you see him? There's two hands pointing towards the sky.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: One and a half. All right, can I head over there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You walk over there, and you do see a number of broken body parts all turned to stone in various states of disuse and crumbling. You do see a young man who's caught with his arms out, one broken off at the elbow, staring up, glasses at the end of his nose, looking both frightened and frozen in a moment of complete unaware danger.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Can I try covering him in some of the basilisk's blood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. You take one of the vials that you collected and take the basilisk blood and pour it over the statue. The blood congeals and spills over, crystallizing slowly as the ice cold gets to it. It doesn't seem to have an effect.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's been too long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather, based on the last time it happened, the blood needs to be applied within a short period of time after the person turns to stone. Do you have anything else that might help?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Probably Greater Restoration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have that prepared?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The warm glow of Sarenrae's divine energy transferring into the stone form. The form glows with energy, and the glow subsides and fades, the stone texture of his body beginning to slowly soften, and the color returning to his skin, and for a moment the head seems to shake, and the eyes clarify, and a voice begins to peek through these previously frozen vocal cords. "I mean no--" (screams) As all of a sudden his arm begins to spray gouts of blood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got it! I got it! I start catching it with the sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (stuttering) He turns to you, and sprays right across your face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good! Splash on! Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Help! Help me!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I grab his arm and Cure Wounds! I don't know if that's a really good move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and heal him up a bit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I try to reattach his arm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather that might have been something to do before you had restored him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d8 plus five.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's kind of fucking hilarious.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 5d8 plus five?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Depending on what level you want to use on him. A level one is 1d8 plus five.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, God, okay. I feel like I'm using all this, but I don't know. Okay, so let's do level five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Level five. All right, go for it. 5d8 plus five.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not our finest hour. Pretty reasonable hour, but it's definitely not the finest. We brought most of a mapmaker back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So how much is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29, okay. As you reach out and grasp the edge of his bleeding stump...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Stop moving!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry." He looks down as the wound has stopped bleeding, skin is scabbed over, and it looks like it's now in a place where it's no longer an open wound. It is mostly healed over, though he is now missing part of his arm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you regrow his little arm like you regrew my brother's little nubbin of a toe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a bit beyond your healing capabilities.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: C'mon, Deadpool hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point he goes, "Thank you, small one. I--" And he goes to reach up for his glasses and... Other hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we're terrible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically saved seven-eighths of a mapmaker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks around at the rest of you. "Oh! Hello, it's been a while. We haven't... Well, I "seem to have gotten myself in a bit of a predicament."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I was... Well, I had two escorts. And I had been making my way through most of "Tal'Dorei, and had gotten as far as this region, and... That's all I remember."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Basilisks? Big lizard creatures?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. Very scary. I tried to run, and that's all I remember."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was it just the three of you, then? Not a large group of people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, just three of us."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What were you doing over here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was trying to finish this portion of the map. If I... Ah!" And he goes over and reaches through some of the snow and pulls up a large stone bag that is currently still attached to his broken arm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Um. Is this...?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope! No, no, that's just part of a-- It was a statue garden, it's not a big deal. It's just a fragment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Well, these were my maps."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they stone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are stone, currently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we-- Oh, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he on the ground still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's standing. "Oh boy." He takes his glasses off and goes to rub them into his shirt and... does it with one hand and puts them back on.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, buddy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like a one-legged duck walking around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do I do?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which hand does he have, his left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has his left hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you right-handed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm kind of ambidextrous."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank gods for that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good, that's good. Well...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A lot's happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's shock on his face. He still hasn't quite taken in all of this stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everything is going to be okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you have a great story now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And a period of adjustment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is very true. This is a valid point."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should send him back to the encampment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like a two-day walk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These escorts you had with you who were also turned to stone, were they important to you? Were they friends of yours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hired them as part of this endeavor. They were nice fellows. Hold on a second." He starts walking off and starts rummaging through the pieces of stone and various people, picking up heads. "No. Well, that's Alex. Golly, I don't... I don't know where Gerald is, but... Can I come with "you for now?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you're more than-- Actually--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's rather smart, isn't he?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He has knowledge of the area.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That actually could be useful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's the thing. It's very dangerous, dear, and it's quite possible you might be turned into stone again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't want that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we don't want that for you, either.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also eaten alive, burned, shot, stabbed--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Straight-up killed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: -- pulled apart, maimed--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beheaded.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: -- Lacerated.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All options.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But that's just in the mornings.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you're more than welcome to join us, for a short amount of time. Or you can head back to a camp that's about a day and a half away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Whereabouts are you going?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're heading up the mountain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll head for the camp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you sure? We could always use you as a decoy-- I mean, as an aid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I appreciate the offer. I have a lot to think about."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we'll run into him when we get back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you need a hand finding your way to the encampment?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Groan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He starts walking northward, basically trailing past the path where you guys walked from.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we should help him or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not bad enough to actually do it, though, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have Conjure Woodland Beings in my back pocket today, so I could conjure you a little posse to escort you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be good!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have some squirrels, buddy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have a little posse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the duration on that one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. That's something else that I haven't done, ever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Untested high-level spell? Do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That always works so well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an hour of concentration.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this as far as you got, or did you make it up the mountain previously?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was cresting through the base of the mountain, and made it most of the way down the "Stormcrest and was heading back through the Frostweald."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you've been up there already?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've been to the base of the Stormcrest Mountains!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was kind of along the side. We were trying to make our way through the central portion "of the mountain pass so we could keep track of the division of topography on both top and bottom."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, man. Why you didn't say so? We could really use your help here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually, did you see something similar to this obelisk at the base of the mountain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not quite like this, though, but there are a "number of cavern entrances that litter various portions of the base of the mountain."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you go in any of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, see, I was afraid those would be too dangerous. So I went into the forest."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, look, you don't really seem to have a lot on you. Why don't you join us for just a little bit, to the areas that he knows, and then we'll send you back on your way, maybe with a bit of ale, a little bit of food? Maybe a weapon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I realize now that if you hadn't come by, I "probably would have been there forever."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, well, we're sorry about the arm, dear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are worse things. And I can retrain to write with this arm. It's totally fine."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. You're lucky to be alive, and now you're going on an adventure with us. Hey, who has two thumbs and is really excited? You and me, both doing this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what, make a charisma check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You worry me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Charisma?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, add your plus five charisma bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20? As you do that, he... "Yeah. You're right! You're right. I'm thankful to be alive "today, and it's because of you guys."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Technically true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let's travel!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, listen, I'll walk with you. Lead the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, so where are you going? Because this place was dangerous, and that place is "dangerous, and we don't want to go that way."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Vex'ahlia will point where we're headed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why don't you want to go that way? Have you seen orcs in this wood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He points and says, "There's a lot of them that way. We came through here to avoid them, and "that's when this all happened."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh. Actually, we should probably take care of the orcs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Get the orcs really quick, and then we can send him back with the refugees from there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We did say we were going to take care of the orcs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We did promise that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you say, Grog? Would you like to kill some orc?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you always ask questions to which you know the answer already?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you like to stay here while we fight the orcs, or could you walk us towards them and stay hidden?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't want to stay here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then you come with us, and then you stay very, very hidden.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can do that. I can definitely do that."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When it's time, he can hide with the bear. Then a bear will be hiding with a mapmaker, or most of a mapmaker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll be fine. Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While all of that happened, for the last ten minutes, can I stealth away for a little bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Roll a stealth check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Based on passive perception, nobody notices your exit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know you can hear me. I'm going to need... I'm going to need more than nightmares. A deal has been struck, and I will honor it. I need to understand what this is. Any time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another flash. You look out and you can see there's one large, darkened structure that you have not visited but passed by on the southeastern side of Vasselheim.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah! Temple! Temple of the Raven Queen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The actual name of this, and you've heard it in passing before, when you were given your initial pass over of the... I'm trying to find the specific name here so I don't mess it up. It's in here somewhere. You see this dark, obsidian structure that is ridged, almost like an even rib cage along each side. It is ominous, and it stuck out in the middle of the city because, amongst the rest of the jovial atmosphere, it loomed over the Amaranthine Oubliette. But this was the central temple to the Raven Queen. You then flash once again, in a long chamber, and you see veils, dark veils passing by, one after another, after another. Another flash forward, and you see a chamber with dark brown, smooth floors. You see gold trim along large pillars that reach up to a dome-type stained glass ceiling of amber colors and white, and in the center of this chamber you see what appears to be a pool of still, crimson liquid. You see the crimson liquid shift, and a form rises up out of it. An arm rises up and beckons a finger. Your vision goes to black, and you're back in the forest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Congratulations, you're creepy as fuck. We'll work it out. I head back to the group.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good talk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was a lot of sidetracks on this particular adventure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all right. Sidetracks make it fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing wrong with sidetrack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Heebie-jeebies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, man, she's creepy!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Creepy as fuck!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Creepy as fuck!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, Pike, good job tonight, lady!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Pikey!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You brought a guy back to life!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 19 strength, say what!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're super strong!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm a tank.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tank up in this motherfucker.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (bang! bang! bang!)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It feels so good to be back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. Come back to us soon! Physically!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, please!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, very soon! A few more weeks, a few more weeks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's coming, she's coming.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need our Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, guys. We'll pick this up next Thursday! Thank you for coming and watching us play around, make believe on the Internet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is next week any-- It's not our 50th episode?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's our 49th!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Next week is our 49th, two weeks from now is our 50th.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21st is our 50th episode.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Last time in our 40s.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Got to enjoy it now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And don't miss the 50th.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't miss the 50th, it's going to be fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: May be a couple surprises in store.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing. Just us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know where we'll be in the story, because that's definitely based on whatever you guys do. But we'll have some fun things here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shopping episode.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. But yeah, thank you guys so much! See you next Thursday. Those of you in Pittsburgh, we'll see you this weekend. Is it Thursday yet?
